form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Santa Isabel Church, DECLARATION OF MEMBERSSHIP

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 Santa Isabel Church VINCENTIAN FATHERS 918 Souti. Soto Street Los Angeles, Celifornia 90023 Vicente de (213) 268.4065 DECLARATION OF MEMBERSHIP In the matter of: MISS. MARIA BRAVO I, Father Luis Carb√≥, as a Catholic Priest and Pastor of Santa Isabel Church, located at 918 So. Soto St., Los Angeles California 90023, declare, That I am a resident of the United States of America; That I have personally known and have been acquainted in the U. S. A. with the above named applicant; That to my personal knowledge the applicant has resided continuously in the United States since October , 19 70 to the present. That I am able to determine the date of the beginning of my acquain- tance with the applicant in the United States from the following facts: That (her) (she) has been a member of this organization since 1st January , 19 82 . That (he) (she) is a person of good moral character, and I have no knowledge or information otherwise during the course of (his) (her) membership, That I recommend the U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service to approve (his) (her) petition. I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on this 6 day of April , 19 88 in the City of Los Angeles, State of California. Fr. Luis Cooto
